careerBackground: I started my professional career working for a Japanese company based in Manila.  This gave me the opportunity to work with their clients in Japan.  I enjoyed working overseas that’s why I moved to the UK 4 years later.  I spent most of my professional career working for Nokia UK Ltd and held different roles while working with them.  I’ve been doing product ownership role in the past 5 years from various industries such as mobile communication, transport, and eRetail industries.
superHeroPower: I would like to the power of teleportation, so that I can travel whenever and wherever I want.
